EmailTemplate.name: Liquor Closed as Duplicate HTML
EmailTemplate.subject: Case number: {!Case.CaseNumber}; {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
We received a duplicate inquiry from you, and this inquiry has been closed.
Please refer to reference number {!Case.Parent} if you have any further questions regarding the initial inquiry.
Regards,
Liquor Customer Service
